Dallas-Fort Worth Film Critics Association Awards

awardEventDetails.title: 2001 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.description: (Darren Aronofsky takes no prisoners in his harrowing second film, REQUIEM FOR A DREAM. Utilizing the language of cinema to startling film effect, he condenses information through multiple points-of-view and propulsive editing. Ellen Burstyn and Jared Leto give electrifying performances as a drug-addicted mother and son.)
